question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements about the Hybrid Annuity Model (HAM)?
  1. This model offers a lower but guaranteed rate of return to investors
  2. It has been introduced by RBI to promote microfinance institutions in the country
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: First statement is correct. Second statement is incorrect because Hybrid Annuity Model is not associated with banking; in fact, it is associated with infrastructure financing by government. Till now, road projects in India were awarded via one of the three models: Build-Operate Transfer (BOT)-Annuity, BOT-Toll, and EPC (engineering, procurement and construction) contract. HAM is a mix between the existing two models â€“ BOT Annuity and EPC. As per this model, the government will contribute to 40% of the project cost in the first five years through annual payments (hybrid annuity) which means the first 40% payment is made as fixed amount in five equal instalments whereas the remaining 60% will be paid as variable annuity amount after the completion of the project on the basis of assets created.
